subject: Stablecoin Lenders Could Earn +20% Real Yield with GAIB Tokenized GPUs
body:
AI infrastructure demand is booming, but how can we get exposure to this upside? Until now, access has been limited to big funds and hyperscalers.

Then consider what if we prefer to keep our money onchain? It feels near impossible to find such a picks-and-shovels play for AI, and manage our exposure with the self-sovereignty and permissionless benefits of DeFi.

[GAIB](http://gaib.ai) is changing that by turning real-world GPU financing deals into tokenized, yield-bearing assets for onchain investors. Imagine earning 20% real yield with your synthetic dollars backing AI compute providers, but then using those tokens to borrow against, lend, loop or LP.

In this episode of [The Edge Podcast](http://linktr.ee/edge_pod), we dig into how the GAIB sources compute deals, how the AID and sAID token design earns yield for lenders, and why this could be a wildly popular and scalable new form of RWA yield in DeFi.
